name: David's Data Viz
body:
### Welcome to David's Data Viz.
This is a site where I share links to some of the projects I have worked on over the past few years.

### Exciting Pages:
 - [Ride for Climate](http://rideforclimate.com)
 - [EcoWest](http://viz.ecowest.org) 
 - [kroodsma.com](http://kroodsma.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
